Robix Error Codes

Certain error codes are generic and may be returned by any NexwayLib function (even if the doc does not explictly say so). More...

Defines

#define RBX_E_SUCCESS
 The function was successful.
#define RBX_E_GENERAL_EXCEPTION
 A general exception occurred.
#define RBX_E_MEMORY_ALLOCATION
 An error occurred while allocating memory.
#define RBX_E_FILE_NOT_FOUND
 The specified file was not found.
#define RBX_E_FILE_ACCESS_DENIED
 Access to the specified file was denied.
#define RBX_E_LIB_LOAD_FAILURE
 A required library was not found or failed to load.
#define RBX_E_LIB_FUNCTION_NOT_FOUND
 A required function was not found in the library.
#define RBX_E_POD_HANDLE_INVALID
 The specified pod handle is invalid.
#define RBX_E_SERVO_ID_INVALID
 The specified servo ID is invalid.
#define RBX_E_SERVO_PROP_INVALID
 The specified servo property is invalid.
#define RBX_E_NULL_POINTER
 An inappropriate NULL pointer was encountered.
#define RBX_E_ADMIN_REQUIRED
 Administrative permissions are required to perform the function.
#define RBX_E_NOT_YET_IMPLEMENTED
 The function is not yet implemented.
#define RBX_E_LIB_UNLOAD_FAILURE
 An error occurred while unloading the library.
#define RBX_E_JVM_INIT_FAILURE
 An error occurred while initializing the JVM.
#define RBX_E_UNKNOWN_HOST
 The specified host could not be found.
#define RBX_E_IO_ERROR
 An unexpected IO error occurred.
#define RBX_E_UNSUPPORTED_VERSION
 An unsuppored version was encountered.
#define RBX_E_ILLEGAL_STATE
 The specified function cannot be performed at this time.
#define RBX_E_ILLEGAL_ARGUMENT
 An illegal argument was passed to the function.
#define RBX_E_BUFFER_TOO_SMALL
 The specified buffer size was too small to hold all data.
#define RBX_E_NEXUS_HANDLE_INVALID
 The specified nexus handle is invalid.
#define RBX_E_USBOR_HANDLE_INVALID
 The specified usbor handle is invalid.
#define RBX_E_POD_ID_INVALID
 The specified pod ID is invalid.
#define RBX_E_DIGOUT_ID_INVALID
 The specified servo ID is invalid.
#define RBX_E_SENSOR_ID_INVALID
 The specified sensor ID is invalid.
#define RBX_E_JVM_NOT_INITIALIZED
 The JVM has not been initialzed.

Detailed Description

Certain error codes are generic and may be returned by any NexwayLib function (even if the doc does not explictly say so).

Generic error codes include:

  • RBX_E_SUCCESS
  • RBX_E_GENERAL_EXCEPTION
  • RBX_E_MEMORY_ALLOCATION
  • RBX_E_JVM_NOT_INITIALIZED
  • RBX_E_NULL_POINTER
  • RBX_E_ILLEGAL_ARGUMENT
  • RBX_E_BUFFER_TOO_SMALL

Other error codes are more specific to certain functions. The docs for individual functions describe when/if they return any specialized error codes.

Note:
When diplaying Robix error codes, always prefix them with "RBX_" to prevent confusion with system error codes. For example, 
 "Error connecting to Nexus. Error Code: RBX_2003"
See also:
rbxLib_getErrMsg()
